title.rendered: Create a My Requests Dynamic View

content.rendered:
If you are using Cases to track internal requests, wouldn’t it be great if users could just use a custom view to see where the cases they submitted stand?  Well with this neato little hack, you can, in less than 5 minutes.

  1. Create a custom formula field, My Request, that is “True” when the current user and the requesting contact have the same email address.  No need to add it to page layouts
  2. Create a view with the filter criteria of your new “My Request” field = True, that’s it.

excerpt.rendered: If you are using Cases to track internal requests, wouldn’t it be great if users could just use a custom view to see where the cases they submitted stand? Well with this neato little hack, you can, in less than 5 min

jetpack-related-posts.title: List Custom Settings
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: What is a Custom Setting?  We talked about Hierarchy Custom Settings in the Keep Clean Validation Rules with Custom Settings post, which let you set a default field value for the organization, then you can assign a value to a Profile or User.  List Custom Settings are a bit different, they don't…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce CRM CMS
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We've talked CMS Connect, Native CMS, now hear all about Salesforce CRM CMS and the wins you get using it in your community!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Community Sharing Part 1: Sharing Sets – Your First Step in Sharing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Sharing Sets are an amazing superpower that comes with your Communities. They are a way to share with Community License types and Community users. Keep in mind, this type of security and sharing is only available for your community users, it is not available to share with internal users.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Native CMS
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Out of the box you you have 3 types of CMS, native CMS is one of those 3. Learn all about it from how to create articles, use cases, and why use Native CMS.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Backing Up Your Org
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: How to backup your org's data and metadata, and what to do when a crazy-random-happenstance happens, like data loss.
